attributes.action: Introduce rolling three year driving tests for all drivers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Coupled with my proposals for 6-monthly MOTs, environmentally friendly fuel duty rises, and sensible speed limits, should go a long way to making Britain a better and safer place to live and work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
